Movie.Description: Alok Kumar, Mohan Rathore Priyanka Singh, Vinti Singh, Neel Kamal Singh, Sanjana Raj, Neetu Shree & Vijay Chauhan
Being struck with bad luck throughout his life and having had to run for his life to escape most situations, a man is inspired to take up running as a sport and win accolades for the country.

Badhaiya Baje More Aangana is an upcoming Bhojpuri movie. The movie is directed by Om Jha and will feature Gaurav Jha, Glory Mohanta, Sanjana Pandey and Lalit Upadhyay as lead characters. Other popular actor who was roped in for Badhaiya Baje More Aangana is Kanchan Mishra.

Film Lootere is a full of Action and Drama. Pawan Singh, Akshara Singh, Yash Kumar Mishra, and Gaurav Jha are in the lead roles. Pawan Singh, Yash Kumar Mishra(YKM), Gaurav Jha are role in police officer.
Dwarka, a millionaire, is impressed by Anil, a principled man, and wants him to marry Mona, his daughter. However, after their marriage, he compels him to move into his house.
Madhav, an NRI, arrives in India to look for a bride. He is accompanied by Satyabhama, the daughter of a wedding consultant, and eventually falls in love with her.
The film revolves around the emotional relationship between father and son. However, for the sake of love, the latter breaks all the shackles of society.
When Pinky gets married and moves in with her husband and in-laws, she faces oppression at the hands of her mother-in-law. She then tries to change her mother-in-law's ways of living.
Nirahua, a carefree young man, escapes from his village when his family fixes his wedding with an unknown girl. However, when he moves to the city, he falls in love with his employer's daughter.
Movie starring Pawan Singh, Monalisa, Gurleen Chopra, Gaurav Ghai, Prakash Jaiswal, Reemadev Naath, Jafar Khan, Irshad Khan and directed by Saniya Media Entertainments.
Vidya, a woman from a rich family, falls in love with Chandu, a cobbler's son. Trouble brews when they decide to get married, but her father disapproves of their alliance.
Nirahua, a widower rickshaw puller, sets out to exact revenge against the people who killed his father. In the process, he meets and falls in love with Radha, his childhood sweetheart.
Raja, an illiterate young man, falls in love with Priti but his mother disapproves of their relationship. Things take a turn for the worse when he earns the enmity of a powerful don.

A young man falls in love with a rich girl whose father asks him to produce 15 lakhs before marrying her. In order to get rich quick, he travels abroad but faces another set of challenges there.
The show opens with the guest explaining a particular problem, usually a fear they are facing and wishes to find a solution or insight into.

Aaye Hum Baraati Baraat Leke is a love story based in the city of Love-Mathura. Mantu ("Nirahua") a boy from Mathura falls in love with a Punjabi girl Mahi (Jaz Sodhi). she is already engaged with a Punjabi Businessman Harman (Meet Arora).

Sabka Baap Angutha Chhap(Bhojpuri) is a Drama and action movie directed by Parag Patil featuring Dinesh Lal Yadav Nirahua, Akshara Singh in the lead roles and others are Shruti Rao, Sanjay Pandey, Manoj Tiger, Sanjay Mahanand, Padam Singh, Preeti Singh. It is produced by Pradeep k. Sharma under banner Baba Motion Picture, Srk Music-Roshan Singh.
The movie is directed by Rajkumar R. Pandey and featured Kajal Raghwani, Pradeep Pandey, Sanjay Pandey and Manoj Tiger as lead characters.
An honest cop gets embroiled in a conspiracy against him, and now has just 24 hours to prove his innocence and exact vengeance upon his tormentors.
Naihar is a Drama movie directed by Ajay Kumar Jha featuring Amrapali Dubey, Gaurav Jha in the lead roles and others are Sanjay Pandey, Maya Yadav, Shraddhanjali Yadav, Brijesh Tripathi.
From classics to the latest hits, you can find them all on our television channel. Tune in for some masti, gaana, action, and romance, featuring the biggest names from the Bhojpuri film industry.

A girl wishes to get married to her boyfriend but fears the restrictions after marriage. Later, she makes her husband do all the household chores.

The movie is directed by Premanshu Singh and featured Akshara Singh, Amrapali Dubey and Pradeep Pandey as lead characters.
The movie is directed by Pramod Shastri and featured Arvind Akela Kallu, Kajal Yadav and Manoj Tiger as lead characters.

Satya, a young man, works for Tabrez Ansari, a gangster. Later, he falls in love with Sapna, a beautiful woman, and his enemies plan to use his weakness to their advantage.
An elderly man is determined to get married but his son is against his decision. This leads to countless arguments between the two.

A king is cheated by his own men and his newborn son ends up in a gypsy camp. Several years later, when a substitute prince, Shamsher, inflicts atrocities on the royal family, the lost prince returns.
Apradhi (Bhojpuri Song) is a Bhojpuri language song and is sung by Ajeet Anand and Anupma Yadav. Apradhi (Bhojpuri Song), from the album Apradhi, was released in the year 2021.
A young man falls in love with a woman while trying to fend for his family. However, he faces many challenges in his quest.

Sangharsh 2 is an upcoming Bhojpuri-Language action film co-produced by Ratnakar Kumar and Kuldeep Srivastava, Directed by Parag Patil and written by Veeru Thakur. A sequel to 2018 film Sangharsh, the film stars Khesari Lal Yadav, Meghasri and Sanjay Pandey.
Movie starring Pravesh Lal Yadav, Tanisha Mehta, Sanjay Pandey and directed by Manjul Thakur.
A conniving son throws his aged parents out of the house. Years later, he meets the same fate when his son decides to teach him a lesson.
A young Indian man falls in love with a Pakistani woman. However, their happiness and romance take a backseat as they face severe opposition from the people around them.
